dao.name: QRY_RATESUPPLY_DT
dao.statement: select * from ratesupply_dt where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_RATESUPPLY_DT_FOR_SELECT
dao.statement: select to_char(begin_dat,'yyyy/mm/dd') || '~' || to_char(end_dat,'yyyy/mm/dd') as display , supply_nos as value, begin_dat, end_dat, room_cods, command_option from ratesupply_dt where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)
